channel.title: Azure Migrate on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Migrate on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Insights in Azure Migrate
item.description:
Azure Migrate is in public preview with integrated Security insights that let customers assess potential risks in their on-premises environments and receive actionable recommendations to mitigate those risks during migration planning.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Discover and assess PostgreSQL in Azure Migrate
item.description:
Azure Migrate is available in public preview to discover and assess PostgreSQL resources across VMware, Hyperâ€‘V, physical servers, and other cloud environments. The service provides a centralized hub to help plan the next steps for migrating or modernizing PostgreSQL workloads.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Migrate now supports migration to disks with Zone-Redundant Storage (ZRS) redundancy
item.description:
Azure Migrate now supports migrating servers to disks with Zone-Redundant Storage (ZRS) redundancy. Users can select ZRS as the redundancy option during migration, enabling automatic provisioning of ZRS disks.

  • Source: Azure Updates
